item.description:
Hey Boys,
Let's do one of the classics this week. Friday night meetup at at Black Bear in New Haven at 10:30.
Easy spot to sarge and bounce to other locations.
This is a great spot for newbies to the Meetup Group who need to start participating. For those who don't start participating atleast once in a while, membership will be withdrawn. This is meant to be a group with ACTIVE members. Just a heads up boys. This is an easy one to make.
RSVP's please
Age Range: 20s - 30s
Dress Code: Classy / Stylish, over the top peacocking discouraged (i.e. Fuzzy Hats, Boas, ect. )
item.name: 4-3 - Traditional Friday Meet Up - New Haven
